GithubProcessor

class babydragon.processors.github_processors.GithubProcessor[source]
Parameters:

  • base_directory (str) –

  • minify_code (bool) –

  • remove_docstrings (bool) –

get_public_repos()[source]

Returns a list of all public repos for the user.

clone_repo(repo_url)[source]

Clones the repo at the specified url and returns the path to the repo.

Parameters:

repo_url (str) –

process_repo(repo_path=None)[source]

Processes the repo at the specified path. If no path is specified, the repo at self.directory_path is processed. Returns the list of parsed functions and classes.

process_repos()[source]

Processes all public repos for the user.

get_repo(repo_name)[source]

Returns the repo with the specified name.

process_single_repo()[source]
get_issues(state='open')[source]

Returns a list of all issues in the repo with the specified state.

parse_issues(state='open')[source]

Parses all issues in the repo with the specified state and returns a list of dicts. Each dict contains the issue number, title, body, and labels.

get_commits()[source]

Returns a list of all commits in the main branch of the repository.

parse_commits()[source]

Parses all commits in the main branch of the repository and returns a list of dicts. Each dict contains the commit sha, commit message, and author information.
